reviews.review_msg: Shane is an amazing professor. This was my first communications course and he made it truly memorable. As this was during the pandemic, he was super understanding and accomodating to the needs of the class. He is also super knowledgeable on environmental issues and how this intersects with communications. One of my favourite courses ever.

Bob is great. He can be a little dry and can ramble on at times. But if you really listen, it can be quite interesting. He responds to feedback and is very flexible with assignments (as long as they fulfill its purpose). Do check-in with him often to make sure that you are on track.
